analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetu nasappaccayo dhammo hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi saṅkhatam sappaccaya sadisa

original: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetu naanidassano dhammo hetussa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ hetussa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitte ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyāḥ avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
